description: Made from 7.4 oz cotton canvas. Inspired by a vintage flight suit. Diamond-quilted construction. Waffle-knit facing throughout. Drawstring waist and hems.
fitting_details: Regular fit with a straight leg and standard rise.
Size 32W has a 12" rise and an 14¾" leg opening.
Belt loops. Drawstring waistband with leather reinforcements. Exterior buttons for braces. Zip fly with a leather zipper pull and snapped closure.
Two front snapped pockets. Right hip coin pocket. Snapped pocket at each thigh. Two back snapped pockets. Utility pocket at the back right leg.
Shell and facing: cotton. Trim: leather.
Due to the natural characteristics of this material, the coloring may rub off onto fabrics and upholstery.
